trans-unit.source: The 'DataMemberMode.Content' is not valid for the member '{0}'. Only mutable reference types are supported for 'DataMemberMode.Content' Mode members.
trans-unit.target: The 'DataMemberMode.Content' is not valid for the member '{0}'. Only mutable reference types are supported for 'DataMemberMode.Content' Mode members.

trans-unit.source: The DataMemberMode.Content mutates the object which is currently in the member. As this is not possible with the current serializers, only mutable types are supported for DataMemberMode.Content. Immutable types in this context are none reference types and string.
trans-unit.target: The DataMemberMode.Content mutates the object which is currently in the member. As this is not possible with the current serializers, only mutable types are supported for DataMemberMode.Content. Immutable types in this context are none reference types and string.

trans-unit.source: The following example generates STRDIAG002 on each property:
trans-unit.target: The following example generates STRDIAG002 on each property:

trans-unit.source: To resolve the warning, pick either a reference type for the member or use DataMemberMode.Assign for Immutable types.
trans-unit.target: To resolve the warning, pick either a reference type for the member or use DataMemberMode.Assign for Immutable types.
